abstract.t: This document defines a binary format for representing HTTP messages. Discussion Venues This note is to be removed before publishing as an RFC. Discussion of this document takes place on the HTTP Working Group mailing list (http@ietf.org), which is archived at https://mailarchive.ietf.org/arch/browse/http/. Source for this draft and an issue tracker can be found at https://github.com/unicorn-wg/oblivious-http.
